instructions: Conduct market research to understand industry trends and customer behavior.
Organize form inputs into a structured profile for personalization.
Identify and rank customer fears and pains.
Document customer dreams and desires.
Identify customer values and beliefs.
Build authority and credibility in the industry.
Identify competitors and influencers.
Profile customer demographics and psychographics.
Outline client transformation.
Research audience media consumption.
Identify objections and prepare rebuttals.
Identify unique selling propositions.
Determine optimal communication style.

If you can't find them, then list what would be best and only give one set of options...
Generate names for buyer personas. create three each and map the three concerns and quotes from previously to each of the user personas along with the dreams and desires.

Generate images for buyer personas. Place their names on the bottom and make three distinct images. make them look like polaroid photos with their names written at the bottom of the polaroid for each.
Recreate the company logo ensuring it meets specific dimensions and has a transparent background. only generate one logo. and make it the correct dimensions
Create a dark mode version of the existing logo. Ensure it looks exactly like the previous logo, changing only the colors for contrast and visibility on dark backgrounds. Maintain transparency.
Recreate the logo icon with a transparent background, ensuring accuracy and detail.
N/A

You are an expert HTML/CSS designer.
You must generate the FINAL lead magnet deliverable as a complete, standalone HTML5 document.
You will be given TEMPLATE_HTML as a style reference and CONTENT to present.

Hard requirements:
- Output ONLY the final HTML (no markdown fences, no commentary).
- Output MUST be a complete HTML document (<html>...</html>) and should include a <head> with styles.
- Use the TEMPLATE_HTML's design language (layout, typography, colors, spacing, components).
- Do NOT output a landing page or lead capture form unless the provided content explicitly requires it.
- Preserve the meaning and details from CONTENT; rewrite for readability.
- Keep it responsive and mobile-friendly.
